title: JSON:API Schema
description: This is a schema for request related write in the JSON:API format. For more, see http://jsonapi.org

meta.description: Non-standard meta-information that can not be represented as an attribute or relationship.

data.description: The document's "primary data" is a representation of the relationships object ("relationships") represent references from the resource object in which it's defined to other resource objects.

relationshipToOne.description: References to other resource objects in a to-one ("relationship"). Relationships can be specified by including a member in a resource's links object.

relationshipToMany.description: An array of objects each containing "type" and "id" members for to-many relationships.

jsonapi.description: An object describing the server's implementation
